subhead: Le Monde spoke with survivors of the takeover of the capital of North Darfur by paramilitary forces at the end of October. They described summary executions, rapes, large-scale human trafficking and efforts to cover up the crimes committed.

EU agrees to ban all imports of Russian gas by fall 2027
subhead: Aimed at breaking a reliance the bloc has struggled to end despite the invasion of Ukraine, the accord marks a compromise between EU capitals and the European Parliament, which wanted the ban to hit sooner.

title: Marine Le Pen axes party's vice president
subhead: David Rachline has resigned from his positions and will not be nominated the party's candidate for mayor in Fréjus, southern France. An image Rachline posted of himself with members of a neo-Nazi group appears to have triggered the fall of a figure already weakened by two corruption investigations.
byline: By Clément Guillou and Corentin Lesueur

title: In New York, Chanel embraces Matthieu Blazy's flair for fantasy
subhead: On December 2, the artistic director of the iconic Paris fashion house staged his first métiers d'art show in a Manhattan subway station. The hypnotic performance featured everything from voluminous dresses and pinstriped suits to fisherman sweaters.

title: Anti-obesity drugs fuel Babybel's booming success in the US
subhead: Bel, the French family-owned company, plans to invest €60 million in a second Babybel production line at its Sablé-sur-Sarthe factory in eastern France and is considering expanding its American facility.

title: Trump administration targets foreigners, beyond undocumented migrants
subhead: Following the attack on two National Guard soldiers in Washington, US authorities have stepped up announcements aimed at immigrants, raising the prospect of a possible 'remigration.'

title: When private anger turns into a social force
subhead: In France, anger is everywhere: in the public sphere, in the media and at the ballot box. The majority of French people under the age of 35 say they have experienced it. From private feelings to collective outcries, they search for ways to channel this emotion.
